verses.verse: But Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>,
Oh that <S%H3863><s%> my grief <S%H3708><s%> were throughly <S%H8254><s%> weighed <S%H8254><s%>, and my calamity <S%H1942><s%> laid <S%H5375><s%> in the balances <S%H3976><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>!
For now it would be heavier <S%H3513><s%> than the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>: therefore my words <S%H1697><s%> are swallowed up <S%H3886><s%>.

For the arrows <S%H2671><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> are inside <S%H5978><s%> me <S%H2534><s%>, the poison is drunk up <S%H8354><s%> by my spirit <S%H7307><s%>: the terrors <S%H1161><s%> of God <S%H433><s%> do set themselves in array against me <S%H6186><s%>.
Does the wild donkey <S%H6501><s%> bray <S%H5101><s%> when he has grass <S%H1877><s%>? or lows <S%H1600><s%> the ox <S%H7794><s%> over his fodder <S%H1098><s%>?
Can that which is unsavoury <S%H8602><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> without salt <S%H4417><s%>? or is there <S%H3426><s%> any taste <S%H2940><s%> in the white <S%H7388><s%> of an egg <S%H2495><s%>?
The things that my soul <S%H5315><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to touch <S%H5060><s%> are as my sorrowful <S%H1741><s%> food <S%H3899><s%>.
Oh that I might have <S%H935><s%> my request <S%H7596><s%>; and that God <S%H433><s%> would grant <S%H5414><s%> me the thing that I long for <S%H8615><s%>!
Even that it would please <S%H2974><s%> God <S%H433><s%> to destroy <S%H1792><s%> me <S%H5425><s%>; that he would let loose his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and cut me off <S%H1214><s%>!

Then should I yet have comfort <S%H5165><s%>; Yes <S%H5539><s%>, I would harden myself in sorrow <S%H2427><s%>: let him not spare <S%H2550><s%>; for I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of the Holy One <S%H6918><s%>.
What is my strength <S%H3581><s%>, that I should hope <S%H3176><s%>? and what is my end <S%H7093><s%>, that I should prolong <S%H748><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>?
Is my strength <S%H3581><s%> the strength <S%H3581><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%>? or is my flesh <S%H1320><s%> of brass <S%H5153><s%>?
Is not my help <S%H5833><s%> in me <S%H8454><s%>? and is wisdom driven quite from me <S%H5080><s%>?
To him that is afflicted <S%H4523><s%> pity <S%H2617><s%> should be showed from his friend <S%H7453><s%>; but he forsakes <S%H5800><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>.
My brothers <S%H251><s%> have dealt deceitfully <S%H898><s%> as a brook <S%H5158><s%>, and as the stream <S%H650><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> they pass away <S%H5674><s%>;
Which are blackish <S%H6937><s%> by reason of the ice <S%H7140><s%>, and where the snow <S%H7950><s%> is hid <S%H5956><s%>:
At the time <S%H6256><s%> they wax warm <S%H2215><s%>, they vanish <S%H6789><s%>: when it is hot <S%H2527><s%>, they are consumed out <S%H1846><s%> of their place <S%H4725><s%>.
The paths <S%H734><s%> of their way <S%H1870><s%> are turned aside <S%H3943><s%>; they go <S%H5927><s%> to nothing <S%H8414><s%>, and perish <S%H6><s%>.
The troops <S%H734><s%> of Tema <S%H8485><s%> looked <S%H5027><s%>, the companies <S%H1979><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> waited for them <S%H6960><s%>.
They were confounded <S%H954><s%> because they had hoped <S%H982><s%>; they came <S%H935><s%> there <S%H2659><s%>, and were ashamed.
For now you are nothing <S%H7200><s%>; you see my casting down <S%H2866><s%>, and are afraid <S%H3372><s%>.
Did I say <S%H559><s%>, Bring <S%H3051><s%> unto me <S%H7809><s%>? or, Give a reward for me of your substance <S%H3581><s%>?
Or <S%H4422><s%>, Deliver me from the enemy <S%H6862><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>? or <S%H6299><s%>, Redeem me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H6184><s%>?
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me <S%H2790><s%>, and I will hold my tongue: and cause me to understand <S%H995><s%> where I have erred <S%H7686><s%>.
How forcible <S%H4834><s%> are right <S%H3476><s%> words <S%H561><s%>! but what does your arguing <S%H3198><s%> reprove <S%H3198><s%>?
Do you imagine <S%H2803><s%> to reprove <S%H3198><s%> words <S%H4405><s%>, and the speeches <S%H561><s%> of one that is desperate <S%H2976><s%>, which are as wind <S%H7307><s%>?
Yes <S%H5307><s%>, you overwhelm the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and you dig <S%H3738><s%> a pit for your friend <S%H7453><s%>.
Now therefore be content <S%H2974><s%>, look <S%H6437><s%> upon me <S%H6440><s%>; for it is evident unto you if I lie <S%H3576><s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%>, I pray you <S%H5766><s%>, let it not be iniquity; Yes <S%H7725><s%>, return again, my righteousness is in it <S%H6664><s%>.
Is there <S%H3426><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my tongue <S%H3956><s%>? cannot my taste <S%H2441><s%> discern <S%H995><s%> perverse things <S%H1942><s%>?
